divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home when I saw a bright light. It looked almost like a flare or something on fire. It was incredibly bright and larger than the moon. When I turned to corner to stop and look the ball came closer and was a triangular craft with a headlight in front. It was very close to the ground and moved slowly but was silent. I could see the outline was a triangle NOT A PLANE. Then it just took off and was gone within a few seconds.I thought I would be terrified if I ever saw a UFO but I was strangely calm. My first reaction was to follow the light but it came to me.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 19th 2012
Summary: Bright light that came towards me and truned out to be a triangular craft that shot away after a about 30 seconds.
